name: Selman Dedeakayoğulları
title: Junior Al Engineer | Large Language Models (LLMs) & Computer Vision
profile: Junior Al Engineer with hands-on experience in developing LLM-powered applications, computer vision models, and multimodal Al systems. Skilled in building RAG pipelines, fine-tuning transformer and and vision-language models, and deploying Al solutions with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and HuggingFace. Proven track record as TEKNOFEST AI Hackathon Finalist and OBSS Code Master Winner, delivering Al products for enterprise clients and academic projects. Passionate about optimizing model performance and translating research into real-world solutions.

education.description: Attended Master-level Computer Vision course with MSc students to deepen expertise in visual Al systems.

education.gpa: Transferred after first year with GPA 3.43

experience.title: Jr. Al Developer (Contractor)
experience.description: Developing and contributing to Al-driven solutions with a strong emphasis on legal technology and explainable Al. Engaging in global collaborations with NGOs and international partners to drive impactful, socially responsible projects. Strengthening expertise in software development and applied Al through cross-functional, cross-cultural teamwork.

experience.title: Al Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade chatbots for Turkish and international clients using Druid Al and integrated LLM-based solutions (LLAMA, GPT-4, GPT-40, GPT-4 Vision). Delivered multiple proof-of-concepts within tight deadlines, leading to successful pilot-to-production transitions.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Contributed to backend development for various internal modules. Gained experience in large-scale systems. Left early due to Erasmus study abroad program.

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Designed and trained classification and segmentation models using PyTorch and TensorFlow. Experimented with diverse architectures (ResNet, U-Net, MobileNet, EfficientNet, VGG), achieving up to 95% accuracy on client datasets. Automated preprocessing pipelines, reducing model training time by ~20%.

projects.name: Agentic Portfolio Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an Al-powered portfolio chatbot using Google Gemini API + Streamlit, deployed live on personal website. Integrated job description parser that analyzes postings and calculates skill match percentage. Supports multi-turn conversations, improving recruiter engagement during portfolio reviews.

projects.name: Social Media Analysis for Earthquake Victim Reports
projects.description: Built a multimodal Al pipeline: LLM-based NLP for social media need extraction + YOLOv11s for drone image verification. Achieved 92% accuracy in detecting urgent needs and damage severity. Designed system to operate real-time with multi-language support for disaster management teams.

projects.name: Gendiary: New-Gen Social Media via Stable Diffusion
projects.description: Developed a concept social media app that generates user content using Stable Diffusion. Designed daily unique concept prompts (e.g., mood-based, seasonal, trending events) to encourage user creativity and engagement. Focused on personalized Al content creation, integrating both visual style templates and user-provided text inputs.

projects.name: Image Captioning Project
projects.description: Fine-tuned multiple VLMs (BLIP, OFA) to generate descriptive captions for custom datasets. Optimized pipeline speed by ~40% via preprocessing and inference adjustments.

projects.name: Face Recognition Application
projects.description: Built MTCNN-based face detection + recognition system. Implemented real-time inference with webcam feed; published detailed Medium article on methodology.

awards.name: TEKNOFEST T3 Al Hackathon Finalist
awards.description: Selected among 200+ teams to develop an LLM-based project within 48 hours at the T3 Al Hackathon.

awards.name: EESTech Al Solutions Challenge
awards.description: Created sentimental analysis solution in an hackathon within 4 hours. Achieved 2nd Place.

awards.name: OBSS Code Master
awards.description: Ranked 1st among university participants in an algorithm-based problem-solving competition.

organizations.name: IEEE Computer Society Turkey Chapter
organizations.description: Coordinated IEEE CS student branch leaders across Central Anatolia, organizing events, workshops, and conferences. Co-organized CSCON'22, Turkey's leading student-run Computer Society Congress, held on March 25-27, 2022 in Ankara. Hosted at ATO Congresium and Ankara University Gölbaşı Campus, the event included conference sessions, over 25 technical trainings, company booths, networking, and internship showcases. Attracted 2,000+ participants from across Turkey, offering exposure to academic and industry speakers.

references.name: Abdullatif BABA
references.title: Associate Professor, Kuwait College of Science and Technology
